data.rationale:
Provides uniform transliteration scheme for Indian languages
    (Devanagari,Telugu,Tamil,Kannada etc.) It is possible to translate
    Unicode encoding back to printable ascii representation and use that
    output to transliterate to same or another Indian language. Thus we
    can transcribe text from one Indian language to another with a great
    degree of accuracy.
